title: Windows 11 is getting a new app picker for opening files
content:
Microsoft is working on a new design for the app picker UI when you try to open a file in Windows 11. In the latest build released to Insiders in the Dev channel, build 22563, you can enable the new UI, which looks much more in line with the rest of Windows 11. The new

The post Windows 11 is getting a new app picker for opening files appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest build of Windows 11 is hiding a new app picker UI, which users have found a way to enable. It should be widely available soon.
